ai-patthana23.2:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.2:0.3_0: for the result I achieved goodness,
ai-patthana23.2:1.1_0: Neither teaching doesn’t give rise to unprofitable results. ...
ai-patthana23.2:2.1_0: Neither teaching doesn’t give rise to unskillful things.
ai-patthana23.2:3.1_0: Not skilled in the results of the skillful and the results.
ai-patthana23.2:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana23.2:5.1_0: Neither unwholesome things don’t give rise to the result of skillful qualities.
ai-patthana23.2:6.1_0: You don’t give rise to unprofitable things.
ai-patthana23.2:7.1_0: He doesn’t cause the unskillful qualities to be unskillful, or results in skillful qualities.
ai-patthana23.2:7.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana23.2:9.1_1: This is the section in brief.
